maptimepdx

january maptime!

MaptimePDX is ready to begin! Matt and I are gearing up for a great year and thanks to Lyzi Diamond, we’ve got a good start.

First maptime of the year will be at the familiar digs over at Esri R&D Center (aka Geoloqi HQ).

The agenda is up to you but there are a couple of fun tasks that some of you can help out with if you’re up for learning some new things. Right off the bat, we’ll need help setting up this Jekyll site: you’ll learn Jekyll a static page generator, Github pages, and how to contribute to the maptimepdx website.

Some bevvies provided but definitely bring your ideas and an appetite to learn and contribute. See you then!

- rafa

maptime
